resources.string:
Xenoblade Chronicles 3 is a role-playing video game developed by Monolith Soft and published by Nintendo on July 29, 2022 for the Nintendo Switch.

This app is meant to help you keep track of what you have and have not done in the vast world of Aionios!

Below is some information that may help you navigate and understand your new companion.

Unique Monsters are everywhere throughout Xenoblade Chronicles 3. They are strong foes with higher stats than other enemies of their level. Some Unique Monsters are even higher level than your party\'s maximum level. These are called Superbosses.\n\nAs for your companion, within the Unique Monsters Menu, every one of the game\'s 141 Unique Monsters will be listed, along with their levels, locations, and a picture to help you with your search. Superbosses have their names in red and another noticeable indicator on their entries!

Side quests are littered throughout every corner of Aionis for you to complete. They are entirely optional, but greatly recommended to get the full experience the world has to offer.

There are over 190 side quests, with each one being detailed in the Side Quest menu.

The special Hero Quests are included in this number and offer more special rewards for their completion. Hero Quests are featured in gold with an additional indicator on their entries.

Xenoblade Chronicles 3 consists of a character-driven story, with over 30 memorable characters important to the overarching plot.\n\nCharacters that are the most integral to the plot (party members, heroes, and enemies) are all detailed in the Characters Menu. There you will find a small picture, the name, class, and affiliation of each character prominent to the history of Aionios.
A red X that signifies a quest has been completed.
